name: ESPN MLS ExtraTime 2002
summary: ESPN MLS ExtraTime 2002, or ESPN MLS ExtraTime, is a sports video game released in 2002 by Konami. It is available for GameCube, Xbox, and PlayStation 2. Clint Mathis is on the cover. The PlayStation 2 version was released seven months after ESPN MLS GameNight on the PlayStation, with the GameCube and Xbox versions coming out 11 months after that. MLS ExtraTime was the last in the series as the MLS sold its video game license to EA Sports' FIFA series.
info:
